idea-plugin.name: TransPlug
idea-plugin.description:
**TransPlug** is a simple plugin for JetBrains IDE (PhpStorm, WebStorm etc.) It provides easy way to manage translation files in your project.

How to use

1. Prepare translation files. All translations should be in one dir. Filename should be like `locale-hereLangCode.json` for example `locale-en.json` 2. Install plugin from JetBrains plugin repository. 3. To open plugin window use key shortcut `ctrl+alt+shift+k`, or click on tab on bottom of the screen. 4. Click `settings` button and pass path for dir with translations (relative to project root). 5. Enjoy!

Features

  • JSON files support
  • All translations shown in readable table
  • Incomplete translations are marked
  • Translation can be edited
    • See me on Github
